about_the_game:
"Heartbeat Girlfriend" is the first multi-ending interactive video application of a love-themed VR platform independently developed by Zhongqingbao, holding hands in parallel time and space in a hyper-realistic VR love experience.
The "Heartbeat Girlfriend" VR love app is set in a college campus, and users enter the application scene with a first-person 360° panoramic view, where they meet a girl who is excited and lead users to immerse themselves in the sweet and wonderful moments of real love and dating with a super immersive immersive interactive experience.
Product highlights
1. Screen
Based on realistic style, ultra-high-definition real shooting of characters and scenes, the picture is more realistic;
・Add edge effects to some screens to avoid visual fatigue for players.
2. Narrative
Cut in from the first perspective, show the real love scene, and increase the user's sense of participation and immersion;
・Add auxiliary NPCs to promote the plot and make the plot fuller.
3. Interaction
Low entry threshold, simple operation, and interactive links can be triggered through specific items or episodes;
Trigger multiple plots according to user selection to stimulate users' desire to explore.
*Interested players can join our QQ exchange group 540344245, and if there are any suggestions, you can exchange feedback inside.
